review_data.title: Super Preis
review_data.content: Die Qualität und der Preis stimmt! Natürlich nicht Sternerestaurantniveau, aber für denn Preis Unschlagbar! Immer wieder gerne!

review_data.title: Great place to stop for an inexpensive meal.
review_data.content: We decided to stop here for dinner. Realizing this was NOT going to be a gourmet meal, we simply wanted to eat "cheap". For being a university dining room it was actually pretty good. There are limited options. Since it was summer, there were very...More

review_data.title: Small portions, lines, unfriendly
review_data.content: It's a students mensa, but even with a student discount the value of meals is very low. Heavily processed food, carbs and repetitive menu options, and portion are too small for an adult. Each time, I'm leaving that place disappointed and annoyed. The staff is...More

review_data.title: Good place for lunch
review_data.content: If you have business to do at ETH Zürich, then this restaurant in the main building is a good option. A good view over Zürich and the lake is added into the mixture.

review_data.title: It's SV, Therefore, It's Terrible
review_data.content: Not everyone in the world will be familiar with Swiss catering companies. Unfortunately, I am. SV Group runs staff and student restaurants across many Swiss locations. The ETH has some 5 or 6 restaurants run by the group. Across the board, the food is bland,...More

review_data.title: Good value for money and a unique experience

review_data.title: Not bad, but nothing special!
review_data.content: Nice environment, nice view from there, but the food quality is average (sometimes below that). Nevertheless, I would recommend it for the nice environment and view.

review_data.title: Bring your own food and enjoy the panorama

review_data.title: Fair value for money
review_data.content: OK, if you are at ETH, average mensa food. This is much what you get at any university canteen. Try the asiatic place across the road.

review_data.title: Bring your food from home
